submission:
class Solution:
    def maxOperations(self, s: str) -> int:
        s += '1' # 哨兵,简化判断
        n = len(s)

        ans = 0
        i = 0
        cnt1 = 0
        while i < n:
            if s[i] == '0':
                i += 1
                continue
            start = i
            i += 1
            while i < n and s[i] == '1':
                i += 1
            ans += cnt1
            cnt1 += i - start
        return ans
